Source: plugin.js

import videojs from 'video.js';
import playlistMaker from './playlist-maker';

/**
 * The video.js Player component.
 *
 * @class Player
 */

/**
 * Plugin to get/set a playlist for a player. The first invocation of the
 * plugin will establish additional behavior attached to an own copy of
 * this function.
 *
 * @method   playlist
 * @memberOf Player.prototype
 * @param    {Array} [list]
 *           If given as an array, the sources provided will replace the
 *           existing internal list of sources.
 *
 * @return   {Array}
 *           A shallow clone of the internal list of sources.
 */
const playlist = function(list) {
  playlistMaker(this, list);
};

videojs.plugin('playlist', playlist);

export default playlist;
